mappers.name: CIP: Email to name in kebab-case string
mappers.description: Mapper to get unique name kebab-case string based on the email, removing domain name, periods, and '@' sign. For example, mapped on an email address of the form 'first.last-ext@domain.com' will return 'first-last-ext'

mappers.name: CIP: Email to name in PascalCase string
mappers.description: Mapper to get unique name in PascalCase string based on the email, removing domain name, periods, and '@' sign. For example, mapped on an email address of the form 'first.last-ext@domain.com' will return 'FirstLastExt'

mappers.name: CIP: Email to name in snake_case string
mappers.description: Mapper to get unique name in snake_case string based on the email, removing domain name, periods, and '@' sign. For example, mapped on an email address of the form 'first.last-ext@domain.com' will return 'first_last_ext'

mappers.name: CIP: Email to name in 99l string
mappers.description: Mapper to get unique name as a lowercase string using '99' as the word separator, based on the email, removing domain name, periods, and '@' sign. For example, mapped on an email address of the form 'first.last-ext@domain.com' will return 'first99last99ext'

mappers.name: CIP: Email to name in 99U string
mappers.description: Mapper to get unique name as a uppercase string using '99' as the word separator, based on the email, removing domain name, periods, and '@' sign. For example, mapped on an email address of the form 'first.last-ext@domain.com' will return 'First99Last99Ext'

mappers.name: CIP: Map user's groups to AWS SAML Provider Role
mappers.description: Mapper to convert the user's groups into an array of lists containing AWS SAML Provider name and AWS IAM role. Environment variables are required for this mapper, read the doc: https://github.com/cip-core/keycloak-extensions
